description: This scholarship is to assist with the cost of education for minorities within the PGA program. Eligibility Requirements Must be a PGM major Must be a U.S. citizen Must be from a diverse background Preference for female. This scholarship is available to apply for during the current student application period.

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
